com.mlt.desktop.control.table

Class TableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • com.mlt.desktop.control.table.TableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TableRecordModel

    public abstract class TableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    Table model, extension of AbstractTableModel with an utility to set the rows, columns or cells that are editable.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setCellEditable

        public void setCellEditable(int rowIndex,
                            int columnIndex,
                            boolean editable)
        Set the cell editable.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The row, if -1 all rows are editable.
        columnIndex - The column index, -1 all columns are editable.
        editable - A boolean indicating if the cell is editable.

      • removeCellEditable

        public void removeCellEditable(int rowIndex,
                               int columnIndex)
        Remove the cell editable configuration.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The row index.
        columnIndex - The column index.

        tableSorter - The table sort definition.
